TEXT.TITLE: OLSON INDUSTRIES INC <OLSN> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr 28 cts vs 1.16 dlrs Oper net 194,000 vs 1,255,000 Sales 27.5 mln vs 30.5 mln Year Oper shr 2.68 dlrs vs 63 cts Oper net 1,880,000 vs 684,000 Sales 100.5 mln vs 115.6 mln Avg shrs 700,086 vs 1,079,165 NOTE: 1986 net excludes tax credits of 1,042,000 dlrs in quarter and 1,603,000 dlrs in year. Net excludes discontinued operations gain 330,000 dlrs vs loss 385,000 dlrs in quarter and gain 485,000 dlrs vs loss 2,692,000 dlrs in year. Reuter
